column4: the chief compatibility obstacle to HTML5 is Internet Explorer at this point.
Which is also why I want to build in flash for now.
Maybe do a user agent check and only use the flash product in IE and load the HTML5 clone for everyone else.
If you are feeling adventurous, you might try installing it in PlayOnLinux.  I have no idea if it will work.  Your other option is to set up a Windows VM and run it in there.
